ff495f01-ae9a-4f8b-80ac-35743a3a683d:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"ff495f01-ae9a-4f8b-80ac-35743a3a683d","title":{"en":"Tuberculose"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"吸血魔團"},{"en":"Tuberculosis"},{"en":"The Bloodsuckers"},{"ja-ro":"Kyuketsumadan"}],"relatedIdds":["62d34aff-ca8d-4dc7-8419-4b3702104461"],"description":{"en":"(from [TezukaOsamu.net](https://tezukaosamu.net/en/manga/105.html) )\n\n\"Tuberculosis\" depicts the adventures of Kenichi and his uncle, Mr. Mustachio, inside a boy's body. After being injected with a drug called ZX that was discovered by Mustachio, Kenichi and his uncle have shrunk and become very small. \n\nWhen they enter the body of a boy and reach his lung, they find that tubercle bacilli (bacteria) are opening a big hole in the boy's lung. Tubercle bacilli send Mode (a tubercle bacillus), a daughter of Dr. Iyoa (also a tubercle bacillus), to Kenichi and Mustachio to learn the human language. \n\nThe two make friends with Mode, but a war breaks out between the tubercle bacilli and the commandos in the boy's brain, and the two become involved in the war.\n\nPublished as a tankoban, Tuberculose is an early work of Tezuka's that has not been collected in any edition of the complete works, nor reprinted along with others in the Fukkan [*Early Masterpiece Selection*](https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68319967) boxsets. \n\nA second attempt at the work was done by Tezuka in the form of [*Monsters on the 38th Parallel*](https://mangadex.org/title/62d34aff-ca8d-4dc7-8419-4b3702104461/monsters-on-the-38th-parallel)."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"c8cbe35b-1b2b-4a3f-9c37-db84c4514856","name":{"en":"Medical"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

The richly imaginative stories in this volume show a great range of graphic style, from painstakingly detailed craftsmanship to exuberant, maniacal renderings. At the heart of each work in this anthology is a unique personal vision and a fierce artistic compulsion–these manga artists are the misfits of the art form, and they are its visionaries.  \n  \nIncluded stories are:  \n1. \"Hell's Angel\" by Yoshikazu Ebisu  \n2. \"It's All Right if You Don't Understand\" by Yoshikazu Ebisu  \n3. \"Steel Pipe Melancholia\" by Masakazu Toma  \n4. \"Future Sperm Brazil\" by Takashi Nemoto  \n5. \"A Love Like Lemons\" by Carol Shimoda  \n6. \"Selfish Carol's Summer Vacation\" by Carol Shimoda  \n7. \"Mercy Flesh (Jiniku)\" by Kazuichi Hanawa  \n8. \"Don Quixote #1 \u0026 #2\" by Yasuji Tanioka  \n9. \"Planet of the Jap\" by Suehiro Maruo  \n10. \"Mary’s Asshole\" by Hanako Yamada  \n11. \"Volvox\" by Pan Migawa  \n12. \"Bigger and Better\" by Muddy Wehara  \n13. \"Laughing Ball\" by Hideshi Hino  \n14. \"Cat Noodle Soup\" by Hajime Yamano \u0026 Nekojiro"},"links":{"al":"49088","ap":"comics-underground-japan","kt":"7127","mal":"19088","mu":"35185"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

In the special effects drama produced by P Production, there is a phantom hero who disappeared during the planning stage even though a pilot film and comic version were made. One of them is \"Leopard Man'', which was serialized in \"Weekly Shonen Magazine''! ! In the summer of 1967, after \"Ambassador Magma'' had finished airing, P Production, led by Souji Ushio, planned a special effects hero named \"Leopard Man'' with the face of an animal. At the same time\nas producing a pilot film for a sponsor, it was decided that a manga version would be serialized in Kodansha's Weekly Shonen Magazine. The artist selected by Shonen Magazine, which was already shifting towards a graphic novel, was Kenji Namba, who had a reputation for his hard-boiled touch works. Unfortunately, the television drama version of \"Leopard Man'' was not realized, but Kenji Namba's realistic portrayal of \"Leopard Man'' became a masterpiece that will remain in the memory of readers.\n\nNote: The Jiro version is digitized as part of his Masterpiece Selection"},"links":{"mu":"kt93qr8"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}}]}

The world is plunged into a crisis of poverty as the population is decimated by \"harpies,\" bird-shaped creatures that feed on humans. Each and every Yin Yang Spiritual Master has their own Ying Yang crown that is condensed by one’s own attribute.\n\nDue to the abundant love the people held for their wine and liquor, bartenders gradually gathered together to form a guild. This guild is named the Bartender Guild, and is respected by all.\n\n---\n\n\n**Note:** Starting with ch. 81, the manhua switches to the long strip format. c0c46de8-d6b3-4bfb-9783-e29028b05f55:::||@!@||:::2023-11-27T16:00:32:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c0c46de8-d6b3-4bfb-9783-e29028b05f55","title":{"en":"Monster Prince"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"怪獣王子〔園田光慶版〕"}],"relatedIds":["7471bb32-2e01-4382-997c-9604da2f63d7"],"description":{"en":"A compliment from Mr. Toshinori Otsuki, Managing Director of King Records Co., Ltd., who has produced numerous anime works such as \"Evangelion\"\nThe first and last monster encyclopedia that my father bought me was \"Monster Prince.'' I would buy a 20 yen boomerang at a candy store that would never come back and send it flying over the countryside.\nWhen I was in the second grade of elementary school, I read Sonoda Sensei's \"Akatsuki Sentai'' in the \"Shonen Sunday Summer Special Issue'' and cried at the end. 40 years have passed since then. I'm glad to be alive to see the time when I can read the manga of \"Monster Prince\"!!\n-- Toshinori Otsuki\n\n[Synopsis]\nThe passenger ship carrying Dr. Ibuki's family is sailing in the Pacific Ocean when it sinks due to the eruption of a volcanic island that suddenly appears! Ibuki tries to escape from the ship with his wife and twin sons Takeru and Mitsuru, but Takeru is the only one. was being swallowed up by the rough waves. Ten years later, a huge meteorite crashes near a volcanic island that is still erupting. In order to investigate, Ibuki revisits a place where he has horrible memories, but it has turned into a demonic island inhabited by dinosaurs that were supposed to be extinct and ferocious monsters. The ferocity of the approaching monster. The one who saved the investigation team from a desperate crisis was a mysterious boy who appeared riding a plesiosaur with a roar!\n\n[Commentary] \"\nMonster Prince\" depicts the story of Takeru, a wild child raised by dinosaurs, who, together with his partner brontosaurus \"Nessie\", confronts the planetary birdman and his monsters who are plotting to invade the Earth. This special effects drama was planned by Tokyu Agency, which produced the film, with the premise of exporting it overseas, and was shot with the human resources of P Production, led by Souji Ushio.\n\nThe production cost was unprecedented at the time, and it was aired on the Fuji TV network from October 1960, one year after filming began, to March of the following year. A profound story. Takeru's battle cry is reminiscent of Tarzan. Although Takeru's weapon, the boomerang, became popular among young boys, it did not air for long, but it was a memorable work for viewers.\n\nThis book is the first book compiled from the manga version that was serialized in Shonen King from January 1964, prior to its TV broadcast. The artist was Mitsuyoshi Sonoda, who had a great influence on the world of gekiga with his bold and brilliant action expressions. The powerful monster battles are sure to captivate even those who only know the TV version."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

But the more time she spends with her cold-looking father and half-sister, the more she realizes that the Lavians aren't so bad after all. Will Blesse take a chance and rewrite her third life, or will she end up betrayed once again?","es":"Después de mi primera vida como hija ilegítima de una familia adinerada y mi segunda vida como hija ilegítima de un líder de una secta demoníaca, en esta vida fui poseída como la hija ilegítima de una familia que estaba siendo exterminada en una novela…! Intento dejar atrás a la familia que está siendo destruida, pero es extraño que al padre ni siquiera le importara su hijo ilegítimo en el original. «Bliss, haría cualquier cosa por ti». Y la hermana mayor, la mujer malvada que destruirá a la familia en el futuro, comienza a aparecer. “Hola bebé, soy tu hermana…” ¡Sí! ¡Vivamos esta vida junto con nuestras familias! ¡Tan pronto como decidí hacer esto, los protagonistas masculinos que se suponía que estaban obsesionados con la protagonista femenina original comenzaron a obsesionarse conmigo…! ¿Mi tercera vida estará bien así?","pt-br":"Na minha primeira vida, fui filha ilegítima de uma família chaebol. Na minha segunda vida, fui filha ilegítima de uma bruxa. Agora, nesta vida, reencarnei como filha ilegítima de uma família destinada à destruição em um romance! Planejando deixar para trás a família condenada, coisas estranhas começam a acontecer. Papai, que na história original nunca se importou com a filha ilegítima, está agindo de forma estranha. \"Bliss, eu posso fazer qualquer coisa por você.\" E agora, a irmã vilã que vai arruinar a família no futuro chama minha atenção. \"Olá, querida, sou sua irmã...\" Tudo bem! Vamos morar com minha família nesta vida! Mas assim que tomo essa decisão, os protagonistas masculinos que deveriam estar com a heroína original começam a ficar obcecados por mim! Tudo bem com minha terceira vida?","ru":"В моей первой жизни я была внебрачным ребёнком чеболей. Во второй – ребёнком лидера секты боевых искусств. Теперь же стала незаконнорождённым дитя в семье, что по роману будет в прах уничтожена!  Планируя бросить семью, обречённую на погибель, начинают происходить странные вещи.   Папа, который в оригинальной истории никогда не заботился о ребёнке, вдруг проявляет интерес.  — Блесс, для тебя я сделаю, что угодно.  А также злая сестра, что в будущем разрушит нашу семью...  — Привет, малышка, я твоя сестра...  Хорошо! В этот раз я проживу вместе со своей семьёй! Но стоило мне принять это решение, как главные мужские персонажи становятся одержимы мной!  Всё ли будет нормально в моей третьей жизни?","vi":"Kiếp đầu tiên, tôi là Han Soyeon, đứa con ngoài giá thú của gia đình Chaebol. Kiếp thứ hai, tôu là đứa con hoang của gia đình lãnh đạo tôn giáo. Kiếp thứ ba… Tôi sở hữu cơ thể của đứa con ngoài giá thú của gia đình phản diện trong cuốn tiểu thuyết tôi đọc ở kiếp trước!\nKiếp thứ ba cũng là đứa con ngoài giá thú… Thật oan ức! Số phận này thật đáng ghét, kiếp này tôi sẽ sống theo ý mình.\nỞ kiếp này, tôi cần ghi nhớ 3 điều.\n1. Mặc kệ người cha không yêu thương con mình trong nguyên tác. Tôi cũng không yêu ông ấy!\n2. Đừng vây quanh nam chính như một con chó điên luôn sủa quanh nữ chính!\n3. Đừng dính líu đến chị gái phản diện là nguyên nhân khiến gia đình tan nát mà hãy bỏ trốn!\n\n“Hihi, chào Bliss, chị là chị gái của em…”\n…Nhưng chị ấy đáng yêu mà nhỉ? Đôi má mềm mại đó… Tôi không được can thiệp… Không được…\nĐược rồi, ít nhất không dính líu đến nam chính thì kiếp này sẽ không có gì xảy ra! Trước khi bỏ trốn khỏi những bất hạnh trong tương lai, tôi chỉ định tiếp xúc với chị gái phản diện một chút thôi. Thế mà… Những sự cố đối mặt với nam chính cứ liên tục diễn ra.\n“Nhóc con, em đang làm gì vậy?”\nHoàng thái tử tương lai cao quý sao lại ở con hẻm phía sau?\n“Cô thì biết cái gì!”\nCậu bé vô gia cư gây sự với tôi, vậy mà giờ lại bám dính như kẹo cao su ấy?\n“Tôi sẽ sống vì em”\nTôi chỉ giúp anh tí thôi mà anh bảo hi sinh cả mạng sống thì hơi sợ à nha…\nKiếp thứ ba của tôi rõ ràng là một con đường vững chắc… Sao lại thành ra thế này?"},"links":{"al":"178023","ap":"rewriting-my-third-life","engtl":"https://tapas.io/series/rewriting-my-third-life/info","mu":"22kwylo","nu":"that-fishery-ill-take-it","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/62890486"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
